segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, seemingly lost in her task of drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron flutters slightly as she moves, a picture of domestic tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance down at the floor and see the water pooling around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to the mess right beneath her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is relentless, as if mocking her focused demeanor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost as if the kitchen itself is in rebellion against her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she continues to polish that plate like everything is perfectly fine.
segments.speaker: PAR
